name: appropriate
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: suitable or right for a particular situation or occasion

example.eg: Is this film appropriate for small children?
example.egtrans: 这部电影适合幼童观看吗？

example.eg: I didn't think his comments were very appropriate at the time.
example.egtrans: 我觉得他在当时发表那些评论很不妥当。

example.eg: Is this an appropriate occasion to discuss finance?
example.egtrans: 这个场合适于讨论财政问题吗？

example.eg: Please complete the appropriate parts of this form (= the parts that are right or necessary for your particular situation) and return it as soon as possible.
example.egtrans: 请正确填写表中相关部分并尽快交回。

name: appropriate
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense.name: appropriate
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to take something for your own use, usually without permission

example.eg: He lost his job when he was found to have appropriated some of the company's money.
example.egtrans: 他被发现侵吞公司钱款后就丢了工作。

dsense.name: appropriate
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to keep an amount of money to use for a particular purpose

example.eg: The government have appropriated millions of pounds for the project.
example.egtrans: 政府已经为该项目拨款数百万英镑。
